---
id: Get_a_single_currency_asset
title: Get a single currency asset
sidebar_label: Get a single currency asset
description: /spot/v4/balance
---

## 接口

**GET** `/spot/v4/balance`

## 请求参数

| Name       | Type   | Mandatory | Default | Description |
| ---------- | ------ | --------- | ------- | ----------- |
| `currency` | string | Yes       |         | eg:usdt     |

## 响应示例

```json
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "currency": "usdt",
    "currencyId": 0,
    "frozenAmount": 0,
    "availableAmount": 0,
    "totalAmount": 0,
    "convertBtcAmount": 0 //Converted BTC amount
  }
}
```
